# .NET Core / .NET Framework
## Build artifacts
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/

## User-specific files
*.userprefs
*.suo
*.user
*.sln.docstates

## Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

## Rider
.idea/

## .NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

## NuGet
packages/
*.nupkg
*.pdb
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json

## User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

## User-specific files (MonoDevelop/Xamarin Studio)
*.userprefs

## Mono Auto Generated Files
mono_crash.*

## Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

## Folder config file
Desktop.ini

## Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

## VS Code directories
.vscode/
.vs
## Rider
.idea/

## .NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

## Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

## Windows shortcuts
*.lnk
